dict.acceptation: 推理，思考；争辩；辩论；向…解释；

sent.orig: But we have reason, we can reason with each other and we can reason with ourselves.
sent.trans: 但是，咱们有理智，可以互相以理服人，各人也可以以理说服自己。

sent.orig: She had been merry without reason, and sad without reason.
sent.trans: 她忽而莫名其妙地高兴，忽而莫名其妙地发愁。

sent.orig: If you follow reason far enough it always leads to conclusions that are contrary to reason.
sent.trans: 倘若你循着理性的思路一直探究下去，就总会导致与理性相反的结论。

sent.orig: Those that differ upon reason may come together by reason.
sent.trans: 那些出于理性而意见相左的人终会因理性而走到一起。

sent.orig: The reason expresses the existence and the existence is the foundation of the reason.
sent.trans: 理性表达了生存，生存是理性的根基。
